dct_title_s: Chile : scale 1:1,750,000 : Santiago, Easter Island, Robinson Crusoe Island / edited by Yusuke Ujimiya, Mark Ramsay, Tran Dinh Cuong, Lan Joyce, editor in chief.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by form lines and spot heights. Title from panel. Panel includes waterproof indication and specimen map that acts as publisher's advertisement. "© ITMB Publishing. 2012." Includes text, indexes, color illustrations, and Metro de Santiago map. Includes ancillary maps of Easter Island (Isla de Pascua / Rapa Nui), Isla Robinson Crusoe (Archipiélago Juan Fernández), and Ushuaia Town Centre. Insets: [A. Central Santiago--B.Santiago-Chile regional map].
